title: Short-term course to enhance science inquiry competencies based on flipped learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Operated in smartphone-based limited tech environments; learning process involving scientific phenomenon experiences through virtual reality simulations

learning_goals: Learners can self-direct science learning by applying the seven-step O-PIRTAS flipped learning model.
Learners can explore scientific principles via VR simulation and engage in ≥ 80% collaborative activities with peers.
Learners can achieve ≥ 75% comprehension of scientific concepts through formative assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
